name: HP Board of School Education, Himachal Pradesh
Terms & Conditions for Center Creation (Private Schools)

details.Categories of Examination Centers: A- Center for +2 Schools B - Center for Middle/Matric
details.Application Process: The Application for SOS examination centre will be accepted through online mode only.
details.Late Fees: For Centre creation a). 01 October to 31 October of the year preceding the examination (Without late fees) b). OL November to 15 November of the year preceding the examination (With late fees of Rs 5,000/- in addition to other requisite fees)
details.Staff Requirements: The Requisite staff for conduct of examination shall be made available by Centre Itself, However remuneration to such staff will be paid by the board.
details.Center Creation Fee: It will be mandatory to all schools/colleges. which apply for creation of examination center. will deposit all requisite fees except short candidate fee along with application, detailed fee structure is as under: i) Center Creation Fee 7000/-
